component.name: Link
component.description: Navigate the user to another page or view.

antiPatterns.scenario: Using Link to trigger state changes
antiPatterns.reason: Links navigate; they should not perform mutations or trigger actions
antiPatterns.alternative: Use Button for actions that change state

antiPatterns.reason: Confirmation flows require Button semantics, not navigation

antiPatterns.scenario: Styling a Link to look like a primary action button
antiPatterns.reason: Links should not look like primary actions; this confuses user expectations
antiPatterns.alternative: Use Button with variant="link" for action-styled text, or a real Button for primary actions

accessibility.keyboardSupport: Enter to follow link; Tab to navigate

rules: Links should not look like primary actions
Links should not perform mutations or trigger side effects
Always provide meaningful link text (avoid 'click here')

aiHints.context: Use Link for any navigation to another page or view. Links navigate, buttons act. If the interaction triggers a state change or mutation rather than navigation, use Button instead. For action-styled inline text, use Button with variant="link".
